website_summaries.verdict: Kids will have a blast as they watch their colorful cookies, pizza, and other treats “bake” in this cute and creatively designed oven. Remember, the “Ding!” noise means it’s ready!
pros: Magical Oven lights up and makes sounds
Features 3 cutters, spoon, knife, plate, and other accessories

customer_reviews.title: Maybe better for older children
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my daughter who was almost 3 years old. I think she's a little young for it yet, although her 63 year old grandmother was not impressed either :) Many of the shape molds are just too small and placed too close together to make good creations out of it. It's a cute concept but the actual placement seems better for older kids who wants to build real looking food creations. Even though my toddler has a very long attention span it was just too complicated.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Our sons love it
customer_reviews.text: Both our 1 1/2-year-old and 3-year-old sons love this play-doh set. They’ve played with it everyday since they got it on Christmas Day and it keeps them entertained for quite a while. It comes with a little oven to “bake” their creations. Pull the lever and the inside of the oven will start to turn red as if it’s heating up and then makes a DING sound when it’s done. Very cute and our sons just love it. It also comes with a variety of molds and different color play-doh, as well as a fork, knife, rolling pin, and a plate. If your kids love play-doh, they’ll love this set.
customer_reviews.author: Jheneya

customer_reviews.title: Love this set!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! My granddaughter and I have had such fun with this oven. The special pans fit into the oven and as a child presses the lever on the side, the Play-doh rises up through the openings as it "cooks." There's even a light that comes on during cooking, and a bell that rings when your "baked goods" are done. It's one of the best Play-doh toys I have ever bought. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: My 3 year old loved it
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves playdoh and loved this gift. It lights up and makes noises when you make the “pie” my only complaint is she is three and had a hard time getting the pie mold to slide on track inside the oven but other than that she loved it. Also my other complaint is I though they made press pies so you could take the play doh back out and it look like a cake or pie but no it pushes the playdoh into the mold and just comes out the sides of the mold you don’t make a pie itself it’s just imprints. There are also molds on the top to make different accessories for the pretend pie.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Adorable, solid, and well made.
customer_reviews.text: We have a bookcase with two large shelves occupying playdoh sets in their boxes. This set is one of the most played with. This review is for a second purchase of this set. A little 2 year old girl was visiting us and played with this set for hours, we had fun “cookin” together. She was fascinated with the timer and alarm. She loved it so much, I had to buy her a set to take home. Playdoh has been around for generations for a reason. Excellent toys, well made, at reasonable cost.
customer_reviews.author: A.C.

customer_reviews.title: So clever
customer_reviews.text: Such a cool set. When you put the play dough in the tray and push the oven lever, it raises the dough as if it’s baking!! So clever!! My 3 year had a bit of trouble with the lever but he’s gotten use to using it now.
customer_reviews.author: bb

customer_reviews.title: Nice concept and dough but shoddy quality oven
customer_reviews.text: My daughter and I were really looking forward to playing with this toy. It looks pretty decent and complete for the most part, except for the toy oven, which is most unfortunate. The oven is the most important part of this toy. It’s quite poorly built; the plastic door falls off and does not stay closed.
customer_reviews.author: Louis

customer_reviews.title: MISSING PARTS
customer_reviews.text: It’s a used product but SO MANY PIECES MISSING !!! Want my money back. This is ridiculous. I took pictures of what I got And what I should I gotten.
customer_reviews.author: Camila H.

customer_reviews.title: More like 3.5 stars, but I'd still recommend it (at the right price).
customer_reviews.text: I'd give it a 3.5 if I could. It's a cute set with a lot of inserts for the oven. The little pans can be tricky to put in exactly right and then you have to press the handle down perfectly to get it to release and 'ding' (as being done cooking). If your kids are older, you can show them how to get it to work. Really cute idea, but could use a tiny bit of tweaking to get it just right,
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: so it was great to see them connect with something that meant a ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my nephews (4 and 2) for Christmas. They immediately opened it up and began making different creations (the 2 year old kept repeating "Pizza! Pizza!" as he carried around his flattened red circle with his "toppings". I got a kick out of that. This also nostalgically reminded me a of a similar product I had when I was little, so it was great to see them connect with something that meant a lot to me.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby D

customer_reviews.title: You need it.
customer_reviews.text: It's just a little tricky for my five year-old to slide the tray tabs into the slot (that statement probably won't make sense until you actually play with it), but overall this playset is fantastic and worth every penny. Was actually pretty reasonably priced when I bought it, too. Couldn't be happier. Home run, Play-Doh.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Really needs directions!
customer_reviews.text: Thanks to a previous reviewer I knew to hold the lever down until the oven light turned red. There should be directions since using the oven isn’t intuitive. Plus it’s hard for a little child to slide the items properly into the oven so they “bake”. I hope that aspect of the toy loosens up with use. My almost 3 year old granddaughter needs help with that. It is cute, though, to see the items “bake” as the light turns red.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Seitz

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to our playdough collection
customer_reviews.text: Super cute cooking set. Very realistic looks and sounds. My 3 year old thinks it's SO cool. Unfortunately it's not easy for a 3 year old to slide the trays in the oven "just right* so adult help is needed frequently. The side leaver is also a bit of a struggle at times but still totally worth it!
customer_reviews.author: bri

customer_reviews.title: Good gift!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift for a 4 year old girl who has been very into Play Doh lately. She was thrilled. Also purchased the add-on pack of glitter Play Doh in girly colors. Just a heads-up for those who don't read descriptions carefully, this set requires AAA batteries that are not included, so if you are purchasing this as a gift, make sure to pick up some batteries as well!
customer_reviews.author: Allen Martin

customer_reviews.title: grandkids loved it
customer_reviews.text: They can play for hours with this set. They are very creative and love to make their own play doh food to cook and then have a birthday party. its the cutest thing and they seem to ask to play with this play doh set the most. They also enjoy playing with all the attachment the set provides and then cook it all up in their own oven while I am cooking dinner. This set keeps our 3 and 4 year old busy and its nice they can do most everything on their own and then they love to show grandma and grandpa what they made for dinner. It seems well made, easy to use and lots of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Mark A.

customer_reviews.title: Almost 3 year old loves it
customer_reviews.text: Box photos are deceiving, there aren’t any colorful buttons or a knob. Decent value for how many tools and playdoh you get in the box. I found the playdoh once it’s played with a couple times is quite crumbly. My almost 3 year old really enjoys it. I think it should be priced closer to $20, then $30z
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Parker

customer_reviews.title: Great but save yourself the headache
customer_reviews.text: *read for real parent review* Oh my goodness, if I could go back in time....lol do yourself a favor. If you have a young child you are giving this to- do not show them the 'lever' feature until they are older and can do it themselves. Our 3 test old is unable to line up the food just right and gets SO mad that the lever doesn't make the play dough rise. She would have been so much happier just hearing the noise. Do yourself a favor and save that feature for the older kids.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Not for younger children
customer_reviews.text: Our three year old has a hard time opening and closing the door. Also friends kids who are a little older have a hard time with it. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Candice

customer_reviews.title: Fun for kids, not the easiest for small hands to use
customer_reviews.text: Very cute toy, and good quality for the money, however it was a little tough for my almost 3 year old to use. Sliding the different molds in and out wasn't the easiest for him, so while I hoped that it would provide some good independent play, it actually required that I sit and help him. But, overall still a cute product.
customer_reviews.author: anew10

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter LOVED this. She played with it for hours. Love how it pushed the playdough up when you pull down the level with realistic sounds.
customer_reviews.author: Christina T.

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun!
customer_reviews.text: My kids LOVE this! They play with it all the time. I personally was a little underwhelmed by the little oven, but my kids love it, so that's good enough for me. It's easy to use. The handle that you press down seems a little stiff, but even my daughter with cerebral palsy can press it down, and also my 3 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Anne K Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little oven and timer
customer_reviews.text: My son loves the oven and how it ticks then dings when it's "done". Worthwhile just for that. The small molds on the oven itself are kind of useless but the ones that go in the oven for muffins, rolls, pie, and pizza are fun. Don't exactly look like what they're supposed to be but still fun and well worthwhile to see them rise up, even if it's so far up that it no longer looks like a muffin.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Boudreau

customer_reviews.title: Great product for pretend baking
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Make sure you have 3AAA batteries for the oven! The oven has a light and makes a ticking sound when u put trays of play doh inside. As you crank the handle, the play doh will rise. Only problem i have is that the oven door is a little hard to open once closed. My three year old niece could barely open it. She loved it though.
customer_reviews.author: Golden_Girl

customer_reviews.title: Sound does not work, oven and cut out are smaller than expected.
customer_reviews.text: Received this product with the box open, it was dirty when I pulled it out and to top it off the "ding" sound doesnt work. Definitely not worth the price, but my daughter already saw it, so returning it is not an option. I order play doh sets all the tile from Amazon this is the first set I have gotten that is just bad. This is also my first ever negative review. Super cute oven though, super sad it doesnt work.
customer_reviews.author: Annieamanda

customer_reviews.title: 3 year old LOVES this!
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old absolutely adores this set! She loves using the pull down handle to get the lights changing colors as her creation “cooks”. Seems as sturdy as you’d expect from Hasbro and we’ve ordered a couple more to use as birthday gifts. Would definitely recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Aunt Schnickelfritz

customer_reviews.title: Fun for kids
customer_reviews.text: I had high expectation for this set, but it’s not as fun as I’d imagined. The oven door gets jammed and parts are hard to clean up after the kids are done playing. They still have a lot of fun with it, just a nightmare to clean up for the parents.
customer_reviews.author: SL。214

customer_reviews.title: Great price for a great gift
customer_reviews.text: This item keeps my granddaughter busy for hours. I could not have bought a better Play-Doh gift at this price. I am so happy that she loves this gift. When the time comes I will definitely use this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Margret N.

customer_reviews.title: hard to open
customer_reviews.text: She loves it but the door handle is very hard to open so she kinda gave up on playing with it when the door popped off she didn't bother trying to put it back on... toys should be easy to use in order to keep their attention.
customer_reviews.author: Keisa

customer_reviews.title: Fun for kids who enjoy Play-Doh. Door was a little hard to open but otherwise a good gift.
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter who is three years old loved it because she loves Play doh except the door to the oven was too hard to open. We had to keep going over and opening it for her. But otherwise she enjoyed playing with it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Marleen Thurlow

customer_reviews.title: Adorable toy / but missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love the toy and the concept was adorable but I had to give it three stars because I purchased it through Amazon warehouse and it said it was like new but it was missing three entire pieces. So that was kind of a bummer. Didn't want to return it, because my granddaughter had just opened it up and I didn't want to take it away.
customer_reviews.author: Hans

customer_reviews.title: You can't go wrong with Play Doh
customer_reviews.text: I don't know of many children who don't love playing with Play Doh! I loved it as a kid, my children loved it and now my granddaughters can't get enough of it. This toy didn't disappoint. It lights up, dings when "ready" and the little ones delight in baking their own baked goods.
customer_reviews.author: donna

customer_reviews.title: An absolute must if your kids like play dough!!
customer_reviews.text: Nothing my granddaughter or I dislike about it.. I was surprised how nice it was for the money. I bought her quite a few sets and this one is her favorite . Worth every penny!! You won’t be sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Helen

customer_reviews.title: Playdoh is always a win
customer_reviews.text: Love playdoh products for my 4 year old. They are cheap and easy presents that keep her entertained for hours. I wish it came with batteries, but the product arrived on time and as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Borden

customer_reviews.title: Everything was included and packaged nicely. She will definitely enjoy this
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this as one of my daughters Christmas gifts! Much bigger than I though. Everything was included and packaged nicely. She will definitely enjoy this
customer_reviews.author: D.

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This is adorable. Our 2 1/2 year old granddaughter absolutely loves it. Watching her baking "rise" in the oven just delights her and the timer is a really cute touch. Money well spent.
customer_reviews.author: Vickie W.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This is truly a fun toy. It has forms and a press inside that turns the Play-Doh into amazing real looking food products. One thing I really liked was how a red light comes on inside that gives the appearance of a hot oven baking when the lever is pushed down, then a bell rings to imitate the end time similar to a microwave. I highly recommend it, but keep it away from small children who will break it and lose the pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Mark McDowell

customer_reviews.title: Fun and entertains for hours
customer_reviews.text: Fun toy,All the couples latest Only complaint is that my granddaughter , she likes it too much!!! She wants to play with it every time she comes over, I guess that’s not a bad thinghaha
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: It’s difficult for ages 3-4 to use with sliding parts into oven, but got a lot of play doh and pieces with it.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my 4 Year Old Niece
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 4 year-old niece's birthday and she loved it! Lots of options and having all the food molds all over the oven allows for lots of play options. Great bang-for-your-buck gift!
customer_reviews.author: Noelle

customer_reviews.title: My 3.5 year olds fave Xmas gift
customer_reviews.text: My 3.5 year old LOVES this Play-doh kitchen. She’ll play with it for hours and makes all kinds of cookies, cakes, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Skonetski

customer_reviews.title: My kids loved it for a few days while on vacation and ...
customer_reviews.text: My kids loved it for a few days while on vacation and then got bored and moved on to the next toy...but that's just kids
customer_reviews.author: OCDog

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun
customer_reviews.text: The oven is a bit hard for my 4yo to open but everything else provides hours of fun!
customer_reviews.author: Mallory

customer_reviews.title: play-doh kitchen creations magical oven
customer_reviews.text: Prompt delivery. Brought this for my great grandaughter. She love it, as she does all her play doh items. I'll keep looking for even more. thanks
customer_reviews.author: S. Des

customer_reviews.title: This is great!
customer_reviews.text: My grandchildren LOVED this, they are 2 1/2 and 4. The 2 1/2 year old was so excited with the cupcakes he made! It’s really for age 3plus though because he thought they were real cupcakes (they looked real) and tried to eat one! He needs supervision
customer_reviews.author: elle

customer_reviews.title: so cute but small
customer_reviews.text: This is much smaller than I thought it would be but my almost 3 year old loves it. Probably because it makes noise and dings when its done "cooking".
customer_reviews.author: Kasey

customer_reviews.title: Fun and entertaining.
customer_reviews.text: Great fun for my 4 year old. The oven makes a clicking sound while cooking then dings after about 5 seconds. She loves it. Keeps her entertained for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsie

customer_reviews.title: My 3yr old LOVES IT
customer_reviews.text: Got for.my granddaughter who absolutely loves it. She is really into play doe st the moment and this keeps her occupied for hours.
customer_reviews.author: April Bergeron

customer_reviews.title: Feed their imagination
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves it, helps fuel her imagination. She uses it all day to bake us food. Definitely worth buying if your kids are into play doh
customer_reviews.author: Cpt.Awsme

customer_reviews.title: A total hit for a 3 year old
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my granddaughter's 3rd birthday. She likes to bake with me. She loves this toy. We will need to buy more play doh in the near future but a small price to pay for the enjoyment she's received.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne

customer_reviews.title: Rather disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Mine does not "ding " despite swapping batteries many times, it does light up. The molds are not molds but the actual piece. In other words you can only make one cake, one pizza, etc. So only one kid can have one at a time.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Fun for everyone!
customer_reviews.text: Fun for everyone! I bought this for my 3 1/2 year old granddaughter to play with and it ended up being great fun for the whole family! Play-Doh Kitchen Creations Magical Oven entertains for hours! So much fun to be had making food!
customer_reviews.author: scottieintx

customer_reviews.title: A good choice
customer_reviews.text: I didnt know if i would like this, alot of play doh stuff is hard to clean. This is easy to clean and really cute I even caught my teenagers "cooking" with my toddlers they love it.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha

customer_reviews.title: Cute-great gift
customer_reviews.text: My girls will play for hours running a bakery with this kit. They are 6 and 9. Would make a great gift.
customer_reviews.author: SchwaW

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for 3 year old gift
customer_reviews.text: This is my go to birthday party gift for a 3 year old. My son loves play dough and pretend play in his kitchen. This combined both his loves
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Light

customer_reviews.title: Hard to open oven
customer_reviews.text: Cute set but oven is very hard to open. It’s a kids toy - shouldn’t be so hard!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonAddict78

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to a little kid and he loved playing with it. Fun to use, great accessories, good color selection
customer_reviews.author: Brady Burr

customer_reviews.title: Awesome set for any playdoh lover
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has gotten hours of fun out of this set. She got it last year for Christmas, but she still plays with it on a daily basis. She loves to set up a sweets shop and have us buy sweets she makes.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley P

customer_reviews.title: 4 year old loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old loves this! She played with this the most out of all of her Christmas presents. I wish I would have ordered more dough though.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley

customer_reviews.title: Hard to open oven door, but still fun
customer_reviews.text: My young kids love this. They play with it for an hour at a time. I do wish the oven door opened more easilly and I wish it made more sounds than just a ready ding. But there's a lot of imagination to be used with this and it works well.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun!  Fun!
customer_reviews.text: Daughter in law says my 2-1/2 year old grandson plays with this all the time! Cool little oven!
customer_reviews.author: travel girl

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for toddler
customer_reviews.text: My son uses this every day! My husband tweaked the door so my 3 year old could open it easier.
customer_reviews.author: Allison B

customer_reviews.title: Get batteries and more playdough
customer_reviews.text: The playdough is sooo small. I didn’t realize the containers were so tiny. And you need batteries for this.
customer_reviews.author: Garret Socha

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the kids
customer_reviews.text: 4 and 6 year old love this set. Good quality, easy to use, and lets your kiddos be creative.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Comes with a lot of oven things.
customer_reviews.text: Just know it comes with small play dough. This is the funniest set I have bought. I love how many oven things it has to push the play dough through.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s a fun thing that sparks imagination
customer_reviews.text: My children love to play with this. They have a great time and love to create different things. They use their imagination “baking” many different things.
customer_reviews.author: Ke44

customer_reviews.title: This set is fun but extremely messy
customer_reviews.text: This set is fun but extremely messy, little play doh bits everywhere and stuck on everything, overall it is fun if you don't mind the work and mess
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Time consumer
customer_reviews.text: This product is a little cheaply made, but its works well for my son, who liked putting his pretend muffins in the oven. Now he can use this one and make many different options. I also like how it lights up and dings. My kids played with this for hours!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Jabaay

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly as shown.... Great quality for the price.... Would order again
customer_reviews.author: Tyra Shelton

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My son loved this gift it is so cute the way the oven really works and makes it seem like the food is rising
customer_reviews.author: Draya

customer_reviews.title: We ended up returning it because it didn’t seem like it would be very fun for the kids
customer_reviews.text: Not many features to the oven. We ended up returning it because it didn’t seem like it would be very fun for the kids.
customer_reviews.author: Devin Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: It’s ok. Nothing against amazon, this product just isn’t quality. Kids had trouble with some of the parts & the microwave wouldn’t light up or beep.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Udell

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Son loves it!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 4 year old son’s favorite gift from Christmas! Lights up and has a little pretend timer. He asks to play with it everyday!
customer_reviews.author: RBVa

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved this for her birthday and uses it all the time. Makes tons of different adorable play-doh food.
customer_reviews.author: Irene

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My kiddos love this toy. The oven lights up when the goods are "baking". Very cute
customer_reviews.author: nicole

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: My three year old daughter loves this set! Keeps her busy for an hr a day
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift you your little chef
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves this and plays with it non stop.
customer_reviews.author: Monique

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: This was bought as a gift and I can only assume the recipient loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Richard J Gamble

customer_reviews.title: Keeps The Kids Entertained
customer_reviews.text: This was a great gift for my girls! They love that it bings and lights up when the "Food" is ready to come out of the oven. This set has many fun pieces and is easy to clean up.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Redder

customer_reviews.title: Fun With Doh
customer_reviews.text: My daughter lives this set. She will spend hours playing with it. It comes with some really good fun told. She loves making fake did for her fills and stuffed animals.
customer_reviews.author: Florence Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has not stopped playing with this Play Doh oven. She is 7 and it has kept her entertained for about 2 hours! She loves it! It worked and the oven dings when ready. So happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda C.

customer_reviews.title: Playdoh microwave
customer_reviews.text: Both my grandkids luv this microwave. A great gift for someone. They will enjoy it!
customer_reviews.author: Bootickie

customer_reviews.title: Great Vaule
customer_reviews.text: This playdough kit is a great value for the price. Very good gift for kids.
customer_reviews.author: Ella

customer_reviews.title: Heavily damaged package
customer_reviews.text: This is how I received my order. And this was supposed to be a gift. Not happy at all. This shouldn't happen to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Grant Roberts

customer_reviews.title: A must have!
customer_reviews.text: If you have a playdough fan at all you have to purchase this item! It is fun and educational. My kids and myself love it.
customer_reviews.author: Crisda Langgin

customer_reviews.title: Great granddaughter loves it!!
customer_reviews.text: We gave this to our three year old great granddaughter for Christmas. We keep her while her mother finishes her degree and it has been her favorite go to toy. She has played with it so much and loves making pretend food.
customer_reviews.author: S. G.

customer_reviews.title: Play -Doh kitchen
customer_reviews.text: 6 year old granddaughter loves this set. She has played with this set for hours since she received it for Christmas. Play-doh sets are always winner
customer_reviews.author: jellybean

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter loved it. But the sound doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter loved it. But the sound doesn't work. And the batteries are new. Wish that I had try it out before the return experied...
customer_reviews.author: Chula

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this but it’s a little difficult for him to pull the lever down. After each use I have to double check playdoh didn’t stay stuck inside the little oven.
customer_reviews.author: crystal

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Great fun for my granddaughter. Kept finding new things to do.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Speck

customer_reviews.title: Really Cute! Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves everything playdoh and this is definitely one of the best things we've ever gotten her. It's really adorable all of the culinary creations this kit includes!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Play over
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for grand daughter and so far she is enjoying it
customer_reviews.author: Keith Romig

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun!!
customer_reviews.text: My grand daughter that’s 5 loves this!!! She plays on it for hours!! Great but!!
customer_reviews.author: Sherri

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: My is 5 and loves playing with this. My 10 & 11 year old enjoy it as well. Very worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous item.
customer_reviews.text: Like so many Play Dough items this is a constant source of constructive play and entertainment.
customer_reviews.author: Craig & Suzanne Goodrich

customer_reviews.title: Play dough pizza set
customer_reviews.text: My 3.5 year old and 6 year old both loving playing with the play dough pizza set!

customer_reviews.text: Works great. We have tons of playdoh but this is one of our favorites

customer_reviews.title: Happy Grandchildren!
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of these for my 3 year old grandchildren for Christmas. Was a big hit ! They loved them . You can’t go wrong with a playdough set .
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hours of entertainment
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old AND 6 year old love this! There are so many different things you can make with it. It keeps them entertained for hours!
customer_reviews.author: Z. Moler

customer_reviews.title: My niece loved it
customer_reviews.text: My niece is a playdoh addict. I got this for her 3rd birthday and she spent the entire day playing with it, didn't really care about the other toys she got.
customer_reviews.author: Notyourfather

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Very cute. My 6 and 2 year old daughters love it. The 2 year old requires assistance to use but the 6 year old can use independently.
customer_reviews.author: erin van beek

product_meta.title: Play-Doh Kitchen Creations Magical Oven
product_meta.description:
Ding! It's done! Aspiring chefs can experience the fun of baking without the heat and dirty dishes with this Magical Oven that features real lights and sounds. Simply put some Play Doh compound in a pretend food attachment and place it in the oven, then press the lever and see the Play Doh food ""bake"" almost like magic! The lights change from white to red as the pretend food finishes ""cooking"", then the oven makes a “ding” sound when it’s done! The 5 pretend food attachments include favorites like make believe muffins, crazy cake, pretend pie, and more. Add fun side dishes with the molds to customize the creations, and when finished, show them off with the plates and utensils. The creation card can help inspire your junior chef with even more fun things to make. With Play Doh Kitchen Creations, the best ingredient of all is imagination! 

Hasbro, Play Doh and all related properties are trademarks of Hasbro.
feature_bullets: See Play Doh foods "bake" in the electronic Magical Oven
Load pretend food and Play Doh compound, then press the lever
White light changes to red and oven makes Ding! sound when done "baking"
Make pretend foods like make believe muffins, play pizzas, and crazy cakes. Compound not intended to be eaten
Includes oven, 5 pretend food attachments, 3 cutters, roller, knife, fork, spoon, plate, 6 cans of Play Doh Brand Modeling Compound (12 ounces total), instructions, and 1 creation card

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
